name: 2 Get information about users (v1.1)
description:
Note. Due to changed access restrictions, access via v1.1. is no longer possible. Use v2 instead. For more information: https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/twitter-api/getting-started/about-twitter-api#item0 This preset gives you some basic information about a user account. Add user names as nodes, without the @ (e.g. "digicademy"). Each user has a numeric ID as well. In case you work with the numeric ID change the parameter "screen_name" to "user_id".


**Login Process**

For standard access with v1 you can login via the "Login to Twitter" button. After that, access tokens are created and you can start fetching data.

**Get the user information**

The user lookup retrieves a bulk collection of user objects. If you don't follow a protected user, the user's most recent tweet won't be fetched. 

See https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/accounts-and-users/follow-search-get-users/api-reference/get-users-show for information about parameters.

**Differences between v1.1 & v2**

Please remind that Twitter provides different API versions (https://developer.twitter.com/en/products/twitter-api). Facepager presets are available for API version 1 (v1) and API version 2 (v2). Each version comes with different access levels and limits. In the corresponding presets you will find information about how to work with API version 2.
